title: got banned, no warning
body: i thought i would get a warning before getting banned. Or at least a chat restriction before ban, could I get some info on this?

replies.body: You should have received an email going over what happened, so make sure to double check for that. If you can't find it, you can always reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get more context.
